page.title: 10Youth Club, Middlezoy
page.content: The Youth Club was reformed in September 1984.There had been a youth club before but it had been stopped. The present youth club is run by Mr Davenport.In the summer they go to the village sports field and play rounders and in the winter they go into the village hall and play snooker and table tennis.They have a tuck shop which sells drinks and snacks.It starts at 7.00 pm every Tuesday and ends at 9.00 pm. It is for ten to sixteen year olds. There are a few helpers who take it in turns to help. Sometimes they have some crazy barbecues to raise money. There were about 20 members in 1985.
